metadata.title: CVE-2023-21102 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In __efi_rt_asm_wrapper of efi-rt-wrapper.S, there is a possible bypass ofshadow stack protection due to a logic error in the code. This could leadto local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-260821414References: Upstreamkernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
